sentences.sCn: 受伤的狮子发出了怒吼。

remMethod.val: 狮子(lion)走过来， 动物排成排(line)

trans.tranOther: a large animal of the cat family that lives in Africa and parts of southern Asia. Lions have gold-coloured fur and the male has a mane.
